message.content: {"given_definition_quality":55,"better_definition":"particle used to show emphasis or confirmation in a sentence","sentence":"这是真的。","image_prompt":"A soft apocalypse animation style image showing a simple classroom scene: two students sit at desks, one points to a book and says something with a confident expression. On the blackboard, the Chinese characters '这是真的。' are written. The overall tone is gentle, pastel colors, slight hints of a surreal, dreamy world outside the classroom windows.","sentence_translation":"This is true."}
